text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Low Profile. Immune to Fire. 75% high-damage resistance. Spikeweed. Starts with 3 Spikes, spend a Large Sun to heal each.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Spikerock just got back from a trip to Europe. He never knew they made museums so big. That was a big surprise for him.

pages.title: âœ‚ Spear Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Spikerocks destroy multiple objects and hurt any zombies that step on them.
